properties.name: ComponentArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: A group of parameter settings that are used to configure the component for a specific recipe.

type.description: A group of parameter settings that are used to configure the component for a specific recipe.

ComponentParameter.description: Contains a key/value pair that sets the named component parameter.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the component parameter to set.

type.description: The name of the component parameter to set.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Sets the value for the named component parameter.

type.description: Sets the value for the named component parameter.

EbsInstanceBlockDeviceSpecification.description: Amazon EBS-specific block device mapping specifications.

properties.name: DeleteOnTermination
properties.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

type.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

properties.name: Encrypted
properties.description: Use to configure device encryption.

type.description: Use to configure device encryption.

properties.name: Iops
properties.description: Use to configure device IOPS.

type.description: Use to configure device IOPS.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

type.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

properties.name: SnapshotId
properties.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

type.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

properties.name: Throughput
properties.description: For GP3 volumes only - The throughput in MiB/s that the volume supports.

type.description: For GP3 volumes only - The throughput in MiB/s that the volume supports.

properties.name: VolumeSize
properties.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

type.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

properties.name: VolumeType
properties.description: Use to override the device's volume type.

type.description: Use to override the device's volume type.

InstanceBlockDeviceMapping.description: Defines block device mappings for the instance used to configure your image.

properties.name: DeviceName
properties.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

type.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

properties.name: Ebs
properties.description: Use to manage Amazon EBS-specific configuration for this mapping.

type.description: Use to manage Amazon EBS-specific configuration for this mapping.

properties.name: NoDevice
properties.description: Use to remove a mapping from the parent image.

type.description: Use to remove a mapping from the parent image.

properties.name: VirtualName
properties.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

type.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

InstanceConfiguration.description: A group of options that can be used to configure an instance for building and testing container images.

properties.name: BlockDeviceMappings
properties.description: Defines the block devices to attach for building an instance from this Image Builder AMI.

type.description: Defines the block devices to attach for building an instance from this Image Builder AMI.

properties.name: Image
properties.description: The AMI ID to use as the base image for a container build and test instance. If not specified, Image Builder will use the appropriate ECS-optimized AMI as a base image.

type.description: The AMI ID to use as the base image for a container build and test instance. If not specified, Image Builder will use the appropriate ECS-optimized AMI as a base image.

TargetContainerRepository.description: The container repository where the output container image is stored.

properties.name: RepositoryName
properties.description: The name of the container repository where the output container image is stored. This name is prefixed by the repository location.

type.description: The name of the container repository where the output container image is stored. This name is prefixed by the repository location.

properties.name: Service
properties.description: Specifies the service in which this image was registered.

type.description: Specifies the service in which this image was registered.

properties.name: Components
properties.description: Components for build and test that are included in the container recipe.

type.description: Components for build and test that are included in the container recipe.

properties.name: ContainerType
properties.description: Specifies the type of container, such as Docker.

type.description: Specifies the type of container, such as Docker.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the container recipe.

type.description: The description of the container recipe.

properties.name: DockerfileTemplateData
properties.description: Dockerfiles are text documents that are used to build Docker containers, and ensure that they contain all of the elements required by the application running inside. The template data consists of contextual variables where Image Builder places build information or scripts, based on your container image recipe.

type.description: Dockerfiles are text documents that are used to build Docker containers, and ensure that they contain all of the elements required by the application running inside. The template data consists of contextual variables where Image Builder places build information or scripts, based on your container image recipe.

properties.name: DockerfileTemplateUri
properties.description: The S3 URI for the Dockerfile that will be used to build your container image.

type.description: The S3 URI for the Dockerfile that will be used to build your container image.

properties.name: ImageOsVersionOverride
properties.description: Specifies the operating system version for the source image.

type.description: Specifies the operating system version for the source image.

properties.name: InstanceConfiguration
properties.description: A group of options that can be used to configure an instance for building and testing container images.

type.description: A group of options that can be used to configure an instance for building and testing container images.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: Identifies which KMS key is used to encrypt the container image.

type.description: Identifies which KMS key is used to encrypt the container image.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the container recipe.

type.description: The name of the container recipe.

properties.name: ParentImage
properties.description: The source image for the container recipe.

type.description: The source image for the container recipe.

properties.name: PlatformOverride
properties.description: Specifies the operating system platform when you use a custom source image.

type.description: Specifies the operating system platform when you use a custom source image.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Tags that are attached to the container recipe.

type.description: Tags that are attached to the container recipe.

properties.name: TargetRepository
properties.description: The destination repository for the container image.

type.description: The destination repository for the container image.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The semantic version of the container recipe (<major>.<minor>.<patch>).

type.description: The semantic version of the container recipe (<major>.<minor>.<patch>).

properties.name: WorkingDirectory
properties.description: The working directory to be used during build and test workflows.

type.description: The working directory to be used during build and test workflows.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe.
